text:
The 114-Unit Marriott Executive Apartment to mark the brand’s 6th property in China Published on : Thursday, July 9, 2015
Marriott Executive Apartments recently opened its doors to both business and family travelers with 114 studio, one, two and three-bedroom, fully serviced apartments supported by around-the-clock staff. It is the sixth Marriott Executive Apartments of Marriott International in China, as well as the first extended stay apartments managed by an international hotel group in Tianjin Economic-Technological Development Area (TEDA).
Located in Tianjin Binhai New Area, TEDA, Tianjin – Marriott Executive Apartments is connected to the highly acclaimed Renaissance Tianjin TEDA Convention Centre Hotel. Therefore it could provide customers with an exceptional offering that combines the amenities of a five-star hotel with the privacy of a cozy residence. Marriott International manages both the apartments and the hotel under an agreement with Tianjin Binhai TEDA Hotel Development Co. Ltd.
“We are pleased that the popularity of the Marriott Executive Apartments brand in China continues to grow and it now expands to Tianjin,” said Henry Lee, Chief Operations Officer – Greater China of Marriott International. “Designed with extended stay travelers in mind, the apartments are located in an iconic location with the convenience of a five-star, full-service hotel. Offering space, ambience and privacy of residential living the Marriott Executive Apartments enables a comfortable stay while living away from home”.
Guests have a choice of studio apartments or one, two and three-bedroom elegantly furnished serviced apartments, each with fully-equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, including housekeeping, grocery shopping, room service and on-demand limousine services. World-class dining facilities, 24-hour fitness center, spa and 25-meter indoor swimming pool with sauna and whirlpool of the adjacent Renaissance hotel are also available to guests.
For family guests, TEDA, Tianjin – Marriott Executive Apartments offers a kid’s club and easy access to the prestigious Tianjin International School and Tianjin Maple Leaf International High School.
The property also provides an upscale venue for business meetings with gourmet dining, a meeting butler and 12 multi-function rooms providing over 64,000 sq. ft. of event space.
Source:-Marriott
